output_list.reason: The function `sweep` calls the `transfer` function of the `Token` contract, but does not check the return value. If the transfer fails, the function will return false, but the caller will not know about it.

The function `sweep` calls the `send` function of the `destination` address, but does not check the return value. If the send fails, the function will return false, but the caller will not know about it.

The function `sweeperOf` calls the `balanceOf` function of the `Token` contract, but does not check the return value. If the balanceOf call fails, the function will return 0, but the caller will not know about it.
